group_1.textRight: Every time I remember that, it gives me a warm and happy feeling in my heart.
Yes, Yacchan seemed truly amazing on that day...
I thought to myself that I'd like to be best friends@with her for my entire life.

group_1.textLeft: What are you saying that for...@It's embarrassing...

group_1.textRight: Eeeh?
I really do owe you my gratitude though, Yacchan.
After that happened, my mother started making an effort to talk with me just a little more often...

group_1.textLeft: I just did what I needed to because I wanted to help@my best friend in distress.

group_1.textRight: Yacchan...

group_1.textLeft: Because I feel like helping my best friend,@celebrating her birthday, and things like that...
...are a very important and precious part of facing@her honestly.

group_1.textRight: Kanae... You've been avoiding us, haven't you?
Of course. I mean, you've been hanging around our house a lot lately...
But as soon as we asked you what you'd like for your birthday, you completely disappeared on us.
Um... We just happened to see it on the student ID@you dropped, Kanae-san.
I'm sorry, I don't think it was right to learn about@your birthday that way...
But still, please.
Please let us celebrate our important friend's birthday...!
...Hey, Kanae-chan.
When I think back on it...
For a long time, these two have been very frank and upfront with others.
And they want to be upfront with you too,@Kanae-chan...
Because they want to convey that they're doing@their best, in their own way.

group_1.textLeft: So then... Did you figure it out...the same way they did...?

group_1.textRight: I heard Yachiyo talking about it, yes.
...We did expect that you wouldn't really want a big celebration, Kanae.
And we would've preferred to keep it a surprise,@ideally.
But once, when we were little, our plans nearly went@up in smoke because we'd kept the whole thing@secret...
So now, whenever we want to have a celebration@for someone,
we've made it a personal policy to announce it to@them ahead of time,
and ask them what presents they might want.
...Heheh.

group_1.textLeft: ...Y'know, the more I learn about the history@between you two...the harder it feels to hold myself back...

group_1.textRight: Well, in any case... It's not just about your birthday@or what presents you might want...
I was thinking we might be able to get to know you@a bit more, Kanae.
Like your favorite things, or things about your childhood...
If you're willing to share them with us, Kanae-san,@we'd be happy no matter what it is!

group_1.textLeft: I don't have any stories...worth sharing like yours, really...

group_1.textRight: Well then, from here on out, the three of you can just@make new memories together, isn't that right?

group_1.textLeft: No. Not three. You're one of us too, right, Grandma?

group_1.textRight: Oh my, that makes me happy to hear.
...It's nice, isn't it? Just by being near Yacchan and@her grandmother, you feel more relaxed.

group_1.textLeft: ...With you around too, Mifuyu...it's even more calming...

group_1.textRight: Eh, you really think so...?
Hey, why don't we go out together after this?
There are all sorts of shops we can visit, and we can look around for things Kanae might like.
All right!
It'll be the first time all four of us will be out@together... I can't wait!

group_1.textCenter: Thank you, Yacchan. It's because you were there@that I...
